description:
For vmware driver, one compute host may be have multiply compute nodes, so the cmd of "nova hypervisor-servers" would be incorrect, because its implement code is using objects.InstanceList.get_by_host, I think objects.InstanceList.get_by_host_and_node is more
appropriate.
title: nova hypervisor-servers tecs-controller-node would be incorrect with vmware driver or ironic driver
